content: although they knit up quick as a blink the details are in all the right places for careful shaping to fit an average female adult hand perfectly the purple / blue samples were knit with one 150g hank of malabrigo rasta at the 3 sts/inch gauge i had about 5 feet of yarn left over from my one 150g / 90 yard hank if you want to make the cuffs much longer get a second hank of rasta the magenta samples were knit with two 100g balls of dale hubro hubro is no longer made by dale but you can substitute with many different super-bulky wool yarns as long as you can achieve the right gauge and have at least 90 yards of yarn
